name: MORTALLY<O>BANKRUPT
description:
Is a game about bankrupt mortals with nothing left but personality, passion, and high fashion. It’s also about the invasive Horrors whose transceiver-tendrils will groom them into hollow, photoshopped Reality Stars. We’ll watch their symbiosis destroy our humanity through the episodes of a Reality Show with cinematics that burn eyes and special fx that hack physics.

This contains the Chat Game's 20~ page full-color pdf, as well as a 'Streaming Pack' which includes streaming overlays for the Stream Game, and some seamlessly-looping break music.
